cause.description:
Small nonprofit organization based out of LaFayette Georgia, reaching disadvantaged kids for Christ. Offers Bible classes, free after school homework help and tutoring, and Christian mentoring. Serving since 2002. Web site located at www.k4c.info .
1. The Bible is the Word of God.
2. Jesus is the only way to God.
3. All children deserve a chance to hear about Jesus regardless of their circumstances.
cause.mission: To open minds, hearts, and lives to Jesus.
cause.name: Kids 4 Christ
